Source code for pypi https://pypi.org/project/meetup-colab/

In colab terminal 
```
> pip install meetup-colab
```
or in colab cell
```
!pip install meetup-colab
```

In colab cell

```
from meetup-colab import nvidia
nvidia.update_12_4()
nvidia.install_nemo()
```

Warning: takes 10-15m!
